title: Taking a time study
creator_credit: Stephen Clarkson, Gerald Cookson and Kinocraft
brief_description: Illustrates the basic techniques for taking a time study. The method illustrated has been agreed upon by the representatives of management and trade unions and is recommended as sound basic training for trainee work study officers. Valuable for showing to people whose work is likely to be the subject of work measurement.
